<div class="container">
  <h2>Our Mission</h2>
  <p>
    We provide culturally relevant health and lifestyle education, resources, and support to underserved communities in East County San Diego, with a special focus on Middle Eastern and Mexican populations in El Cajon, California.
  </p>

  <h2>What We Do</h2>
  <ul>
    <li><strong>Community Workshops:</strong> Free sessions on health and wellness.</li>
    <li><strong>Outreach Programs:</strong> Collaborations with local clinics and organizations.</li>
    <li><strong>Volunteer Initiatives:</strong> Opportunities to make a difference in your community.</li>
  </ul>

  <h2>Upcoming Events</h2>
  <p>
    Stay tuned for our upcoming community events and workshops. We’re planning interactive sessions to empower and educate our community.
  </p>
